name: Dermaware Anti-Oxidant Cleanser
description:
Skin Type:  Safe and effective for all.  Will not cause breakout.  Does not overcleanse. 

Sugar & Swank has trouble keeping this gentle, thorough, oil and soap free cleanser in stock.  It contains anti-oxidant vitamins A, C and E to help fight the free radicals that cause the skin to age.  In addition, it contains Lactic Acid, a natural exfoliant which encourages dead cells to slough off so newer, fresher cells can emerge.

name: Dermaware Deep & Clear Cleanser
description:
Skin Type:  Oily and/or prone to regular breakout

A deep and exfoliating cleanser containing Witch Hazel, Tea Tree and Lactic Acid - all of which expertly cleanse pores and help to clear and prevent acne.  This cleanser is anti-septic, yet the conditioning glucans found in it help to soften the skin, balancing any harsh reactions.

name: Dermaware Foaming Creme Cleanser
description:
Skin Type:  Skin which suffers from mild or occasional breakout but is most often clear.

A very gentle yet effective cleanser that contains salicylic acid, vanilla and raspberry - three ingredients that thoroughly cleanse pores. Sensitive enough for daily use.

name: Dermaware Pure & Gentle Cleanser
description:
Skin Type:  Sensitive or Maintaining

Perfect cleanser for teens or for those sensitive to "too much."  Gentle, pure and refreshing ingredients effectively cleanse the skin while soothing Chamomile, Elder Flower, Cucumber, Comfrey and Aloe soothe and protect it.
